sen.j: 仮名草子（かなぞうし）とは、江戸時代初期に仮名 (文字)、もしくは仮名交じり文で書かれた、近世文学における物語・実用的な文章を総称したもの。
sen.e: Kana Zoshi collectively means stories/practical texts of the Kinsei Bungaku (Japanese Edo period literature) written in kana characters or a mixture of kanji and kana during the early Edo period.

sen.e: It was created as an extension of Otogi Zoshi and published as a reading material for the general public written in kana characters including all sorts of fields.

sen.e: Many of the authors were from the intellectual population at the time and Ryoi ASAI, Shosan SUZUKI, Mitsuhiro KARASUMARU are known.
